00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIDI_IN_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIDI_IN_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 #include "midi/midi.h"
00034 #include "lubyk/Fifo.h"
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 
00037 using namespace lubyk;
00038 
00039 namespace midi {
00040   typedef std::vector<unsigned char> MsgVector;
00041 
00050 class In : public lubyk::Fifo<MsgVector>, public LuaObject {
00051 
00052 public:
00053   In()
00054       : port_id_(-1),
00055         port_name_("lubyk"),
00056         midi_in_(NULL) {
00057 
00058     midi_in_ = new RtMidiIn;
00059 
00060     // set callback
00061     midi_in_->setCallback(In::s_callback, (void*)this);
00062   }
00063 
00064   ~In() {}
00065 
00066   int port() const {
00067     return port_id_;
00068   }
00069 
00070   const char *portName() const {
00071     return port_name_.c_str();
00072   }
00073 
00074   void openPort(int port, lua_State *L) {
00075     if (midi_in_ == NULL) {
00076       lua_pushstring(L, "RtMidiIn not initialized: cannot open port.");
00077       lua_error(L);
00078     }
00079     midi_in_->closePort();
00080 
00081     if (port == -1) {
00082       // create a virtual port
00083       midi_in_->openVirtualPort(port_name_);
00084     } else {
00085       // try to connect to the given port
00086       midi_in_->openPort(port);
00087       port_name_ = midi_in_->getPortName(port);
00088     }
00089     port_id_ = port;
00090   }
00091 
00092   void openPort(const char *port_name, lua_State *L) {
00093     // 1. find port from given name
00094     int port_count = midi_in_->getPortCount();
00095     std::string name;
00096 
00097     for (int i = 0; i < port_count; ++i) {
00098       name = midi_in_->getPortName(i);
00099       if (name == port_name) {
00100         return openPort(i, L);
00101       }
00102     }
00103     lua_pushfstring(L, "Port '%s' not found.", port_name);
00104     lua_error(L);
00105   }
00106 
00107   void virtualPort(const char *port_name, lua_State *L) {
00108     port_name_ = port_name;
00109     return openPort(-1, L);
00110   }
00111 
00112 protected:
00113 
00114   virtual LuaStackSize unpack(lua_State *L, MsgVector *message) {
00115     if (message->size() == 0) return 0;  // no message
00116     unsigned char channel = message->at(0);
00117     
00118     lua_newtable(L);
00119     // <tbl>
00120     // type = 'xxxx'
00121     lua_pushstring(L, "type");
00122     switch(channel) {
00123       case 0xfa:
00124         lua_pushstring(L, "Clock");
00125         lua_settable(L, -3);
00126         lua_pushstring(L, "op");
00127         lua_pushstring(L, "Start");
00128         lua_settable(L, -3);
00129         break;
00130       case 0xfc:
00131         lua_pushstring(L, "Clock");
00132         lua_settable(L, -3);
00133         lua_pushstring(L, "op");
00134         lua_pushstring(L, "Stop");
00135         lua_settable(L, -3);
00136         break;
00137       case 0xf8:
00138         lua_pushstring(L, "Clock");
00139         lua_settable(L, -3);
00140         lua_pushstring(L, "op");
00141         lua_pushstring(L, "Tick");
00142         lua_settable(L, -3);
00143         break;
00144       case 0xfb:
00145         lua_pushstring(L, "Clock");
00146         lua_settable(L, -3);
00147         lua_pushstring(L, "op");
00148         lua_pushstring(L, "Continue");
00149         lua_settable(L, -3);
00150         break;
00151       default:
00152         if (message->size() < 3) return 0;  // error
00153         // FIXME: other messages not implemented yet.
00154         if (channel >= 0x90) {
00155           unsigned int velocity = message->at(2);
00156           if (velocity > 0) {
00157             lua_pushstring(L, "NoteOn");
00158           } else {
00159             lua_pushstring(L, "NoteOff");
00160           }
00161           lua_settable(L, -3);
00162           lua_pushstring(L, "channel");
00163           lua_pushnumber(L, channel - 0x90 + 1);
00164           lua_settable(L, -3);
00165 
00166           lua_pushstring(L, "note");
00167           lua_pushnumber(L, message->at(1));
00168           lua_settable(L, -3);
00169 
00170           lua_pushstring(L, "velocity");
00171           lua_pushnumber(L, velocity);
00172           lua_settable(L, -3);
00173         } else if (channel >= 0x80) {
00174           lua_pushstring(L, "NoteOff");
00175           lua_settable(L, -3);
00176           lua_pushstring(L, "channel");
00177           lua_pushnumber(L, channel - 0x80 + 1);
00178           lua_settable(L, -3);
00179 
00180           lua_pushstring(L, "note");
00181           lua_pushnumber(L, message->at(1));
00182           lua_settable(L, -3);
00183 
00184           lua_pushstring(L, "velocity");
00185           lua_pushnumber(L, message->at(2));
00186           lua_settable(L, -3);
00187         } else if (channel >= 0xB0) {
00188           lua_pushstring(L, "Ctrl");
00189           lua_settable(L, -3);
00190           lua_pushstring(L, "channel");
00191           lua_pushnumber(L, channel - 0x80 + 1);
00192           lua_settable(L, -3);
00193           
00194           lua_pushstring(L, "ctrl");
00195           lua_pushnumber(L, message->at(1));
00196           lua_settable(L, -3);
00197 
00198           lua_pushstring(L, "value");
00199           lua_pushnumber(L, message->at(2));
00200           lua_settable(L, -3);
00201         } else {  
00202           fprintf(stderr, "unknown message type %i.\n", (int)channel);
00203           return 0;
00204         }
00205     }
00206     return 1;
00207   }
00208 
00209 private:
00210 
00213   static void s_callback(double timestamp, MsgVector *message, void *data) {
00214     ((In*)data)->receive(timestamp, message);
00215   }
00216 
00217   inline void receive(double timestamp, MsgVector *message) {
00218     // push a copy
00219     if (!push(new MsgVector(*message))) {
00220       fprintf(stderr, "Midi message buffer full !\n");
00221     }
00222   }

00259 
00262   std::string port_name_;
